nodes.text: The group known as the Opaline Creed lived in a cloister in Templemarch on the planet Crucival. In the year 4 BBY, Umu Seven was sent from the cloister to collect supplies from a neighboring bazaar where he ran into his estranged father. After returning to the cloister, Umu Seven discovered his father had slipped a thorn pear into his bag without him noticing, and not wanting the gift he left it in the cloister's storeroom. Four years later, the cloister was in ruins. When Namir barely escaped the rebel attack on the Imperial transmitter tower and watched the final day of the battle from what was left of the cloister and camped out there for almost a week after.
The cloister first appeared in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, which was written by Alexander Freed and released on November 3, 2015.
